travelInTime: Travel in time with Asteria Kremlin Palace
travelInTimeDesc: Asteria Kremlin Palace was built inspired by Kremlin Palace in Moscow to give you a chance to feel the magnificent atmosphere and discover the home of the Russian Czars. The hotel is located in one of the most modern resorts of Antalya
travelInTimeDesc2: Kundu. Kundu attracts tourists not only with close location to Antalya city center but also with the beauty of the golden beaches and relaxing atmosphere
specialToDesc: Asteria Kremlin Palace offers you and your loved ones comfortable accommodation possibilites. Hotel’s location give you the possibility to explore the marvelous Antalya while offering magnificent atmosphere as well as quality service.
